mapper.insert: insert into asesoria (grupo_idgrupoasistente, monitoriaregistrada, idestudiante, nombreestudiante, observaciones) values(#{grupo}, 1, #{idEst}, #{nombreEst}, #{obser})
mapper.select:
select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha
from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as m where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and #{semestre} = (select g.semestre_numero from grupo as g where grupo_idgrupoasistente = g.idgrupo)

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha
from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as m, temaasesoria as ta where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and #{semestre} = (select g.semestre_numero from grupo as g where grupo_idgrupoasistente = g.idgrupo) and ta.asesoria_idasesoria = a.idasesoria and ta.temacurso_idtemacurso = #{idtema}

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha
from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as m, grupo as g, monitoria as mo where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and #{semestre} = (select g.semestre_numero from grupo as g where grupo_idgrupoasistente = g.idgrupo) and m.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.grupo_idgrupo = g.idgrupo and g.monitor_persona_id = #{idmonitor}

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha
from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as m, monitoria as mo where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and m.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.grupo_idgrupo=#{idgrupo}

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha
from asesoria as a, grupo as g, monitoriaregistrada as m where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and a.grupo_idgrupoasistente = g.idgrupo and g.semestre_numero = #{semestre} and g.curso_id = #{idcurso}

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, m.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, m.ip as mrip, m.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, m.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, m.fecha as mrfecha from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as m where a.monitoriaregistrada = m.idmonitoriaregistrada and m.idmonitoriaregistrada = #{idmonitoriaregistrada}

select a.idasesoria as aid, a.estudiante_carnet as aidestudiante, a.observaciones as aobservaciones, mr.idmonitoriaregistrada as mronid, mr.ip as mrip, mr.horacomienzo as mrhorainicio, mr.horafinalizacion as mrhorafin, mr.fecha as mrfecha from asesoria as a, monitoriaregistrada as mr, monitoria as mo where a.monitoriaregistrada = mr.idmonitoriaregistrada and mr.monitoria_idmonitoria = mo.idmonitoria and mo.idmonitoria = #{idmonitoria} order by mr.fecha desc
